data.title: White House Releases State Dinner Guest List
data.meta_description: This evening, the President and the First Lady of the United States will host His Excellency William Samoei Ruto, President of the Republic of Kenya &
data.text:
This evening, the President and the First Lady of the United States will host His Excellency William Samoei Ruto, President of the Republic of Kenya & Her Excellency Rachel Ruto, for a State Dinner.

The following is a complete list of expected guests:

THE PRESIDENT AND DR. BIDEN

HIS EXCELLENCY WILLIAM SAMOEI RUTO, PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF KENYA & HER EXCELLENCY RACHEL RUTO

The Honorable Alice P. Albright, Chief Executive Officer, Millennium Challenge Corporation & Mr. Gregory B. Bowes

The Honorable Elizabeth E. Alexander, Deputy Assistant to the President and Communications Director for the First Lady & Mr. David Wade

Mr. Franklin O. Amoo & Dr. Zainab Usman
